title: IsoQuant: Raw Means, Calibration & Quantification for Isotope Analysis
description: IsoQuant is a desktop application for processing and analyzing stable isotope data with configurable reference standards. It provides tools for raw data processing, calibration curve calculation (δ18O and δ2H), sample quantification, data visualization, and export to Excel format. The software implements a multi-curve calibration approach with rigorous uncertainty propagation, conforming to IAEA international standards for isotope geochemistry.
